page.title: 04Local News (2), Bowness.
page.content:
At the end of May this year{H.M.Queen {Elizabeth II}passed through Windermere on her visit to the Lake District. The whole school went out and cheered her on her way.
Also in May{Bowness Civic Society}held an{Environment Week.}Our school took part in a competition to design a poster for a new bottle bank and {Thomas Tyson}from{Troutbeck Park Farm won the primary age group and the best poster overall.
We also did a{litter sweep}in Sheriff's Wood and removed a full lorry load of rubbish such as Tin Cans, Bicycle Frames, Plastic Bags and 14 sacks of general litter.
